description: study for a stage set; black ground with square element in center bottom; trapezoid shaped element at left and right in each top corner; elements may be collage/pasted to backing sheet; each of four elements has light green ground with different types of colorful fish, blue waves and multicolored sea plants; stylized woman inside a seashell with a pearl above her head in LRC of square--tan stylized standing woman with arms and hair extending upward as sea plants in LLC of square; four holes at top of sheet
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

on back LRC, in white: [Erté]; see Inscription
title: Fond de la Mer Décor
